definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: This bourn is the one that many serious authors go in for.
sentences.chinese: 這是古今中外許多嚴肅的藝術家孜孜以求的藝術境界。

sentences.english: A harmonious society is an ideal for which mankind has been searching indefatigably.
sentences.chinese: 和諧社會是人類孜孜以求的理想目標。

sentences.english: To build a better future is the long-cherished dream of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 建設一個更加美好社會，是人類孜孜以求的理想。

sentences.english: It was her diligently strive after the attainment of.
sentences.chinese: 那是她孜孜以求的正果。

sentences.english: To build a better society is the ideal pursued by humanity assiduously.
sentences.chinese: 建設一個更加美好的社會是人類孜孜以求的理想。

sentences.english: I wondered if I would ever find my prince, my soul mate.
sentences.chinese: 一直以來，我孜孜以求自己的白馬王子，藍顏知己。

sentences.english: The boy in the foreign cobest, continued his studies.
sentences.chinese: 男孩在國外孜孜以求，繼續着他的學業。

definition: lit. diligent and never slacking (idiom); continuous concentrated effort/assiduous (in study)/to concentrate
to search for sth/to seek/to quest/to explore
to burn the midnight oil (idiom); to work continuously night and day
to persevere unremittingly (idiom); to keep going until the end
to make industrious and diligent efforts (idiom)
to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly/to seek after/to woo
to perfect sth that is already outstanding (idiom); constantly improving
